title: The Magic Academy’s Romantic Circumstances - Novel Updates
tags: Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Multiple POV   Older Love Interests   R-15
author: Kazuki Wataru   香月航
description: Even though I’m just a commoner attending this prestigious magic academy, for some reason the school’s top prodigy is fixated on me. A man with such an esteemed noble pedigree and beautiful looks – really, someone like this shouldn’t be interested in me. That sort of couples’ sugary sweet, mushy talk… Please, I’m begging you! Start this sensual love affair with someone else!>
